name: ThunderHTMLedit
description: Thunderbird HTML editor. This add-on adds a HTML tab to the composition window where you can see and edit the HTML source of the message. Original idea by Łukasz 'Arivald' Płomiński, author of the 'Stationery' add-on. Based on Ace HTML editor, https://ace.c9.io/. HTML icon by PelFusion (www.pelfusion.com).
author: Jorg K
